verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> summoned <S%H7121><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Assemble <S%H622><s%> yourselves that I may tell <S%H5046><s%> you what <S%H834><s%> shall befall <S%H7122><s%> you in the days <S%H3117><s%> to come. <S%H319><s%>
"Gather <S%H6908><s%> together and hear, <S%H8085><s%> O sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> And listen <S%H8085><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> your father.

"Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> you are my first-born; My might <S%H3581><s%> and the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of my strength, <S%H202><s%> Preeminent <S%H3499><s%> in dignity <S%H7613><s%> and preeminent <S%H3499><s%> in power. <S%H5794><s%>

"Uncontrolled <S%H6349><s%> as water, <S%H4325><s%> you shall not have <S%H3498><s%> preeminence, <S%H3498><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> you went <S%H5927><s%> up to your father's bed; <S%H4904><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> you defiled <S%H2490><s%> [it] – he went <S%H5927><s%> up to my couch. <S%H3326><s%>
"Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%> are brothers; <S%H251><s%> Their swords <S%H4380><s%> are implements <S%H3627><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

"Let my soul <S%H5315><s%> not enter <S%H935><s%> into their council; <S%H5475><s%> Let not my glory <S%H9202><s%> be united <S%H3161><s%> with their assembly; <S%H6951><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> in their anger <S%H639><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> And in their self-will they lamed <S%H9432><s%> oxen. <S%H7794><s%>

"Cursed <S%H779><s%> be their anger, <S%H639><s%> for it is fierce; <S%H5794><s%> And their wrath, <S%H5678><s%> for it is cruel. <S%H7185><s%> I will disperse <S%H2505><s%> them in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> And scatter <S%H6327><s%> them in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Judah, <S%H3063><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you; Your hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be on the neck <S%H6203><s%> of your enemies; <S%H340><s%> Your father's sons <S%H1121><s%> shall bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to you.

"Judah <S%H3063><s%> is a lion <S%H9030><s%>'s whelp; <S%H1482><s%> From the prey, <S%H2964><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> you have gone <S%H5927><s%> up. He couches, <S%H3766><s%> he lies <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> as a lion, <S%H3833><s%> And as a lion, who <S%H4310><s%> dares rouse <S%H6965><s%> him up?

"The scepter <S%H7626><s%> shall not depart <S%H5493><s%> from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> the ruler's staff <S%H2710><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3588><s%> Shiloh <S%H7886><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> And to him [shall be] the obedience <S%H3349><s%> of the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

"He ties <S%H631><s%> [his] foal <S%H5895><s%> to the vine, <S%H1612><s%> And his donkey's colt <S%H1121><s%> to the choice <S%H9634><s%> vine; <S%H9634><s%> He washes <S%H3526><s%> his garments <S%H3830><s%> in wine, <S%H3196><s%> And his robes <S%H5497><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes. <S%H6025><s%>
"His eyes <S%H5869><s%> are dull <S%H2447><s%> from wine, <S%H3196><s%> And his teeth <S%H8127><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> from milk. <S%H2461><s%>

"Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> at the seashore <S%H3220><s%>; <S%H2348><s%> And he [shall be] a haven <S%H2348><s%> for ships, <S%H591><s%> And his flank <S%H3411><s%> [shall be] toward <S%H5921><s%> Sidon. <S%H6721><s%>
"Issachar <S%H3485><s%> is a strong <S%H1634><s%> donkey, <S%H2543><s%> Lying <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the sheepfolds. <S%H4942><s%>

"When he saw <S%H7200><s%> that a resting <S%H4496><s%> place <S%H4496><s%> was good <S%H2896><s%> And that the land <S%H776><s%> was pleasant, <S%H5276><s%> He bowed <S%H5186><s%> his shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to bear <S%H5445><s%> [burdens], And became <S%H1961><s%> a slave <S%H5647><s%> at forced <S%H4522><s%> labor. <S%H4522><s%>
"Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> As one <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be a serpent <S%H5175><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> A horned <S%H8207><s%> snake <S%H8207><s%> in the path, <S%H734><s%> That bites <S%H5391><s%> the horse's heels, <S%H6119><s%> So that his rider <S%H7392><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> backward. <S%H268><s%>
"For Thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> I wait, <S%H6960><s%> O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"As for Gad, <S%H1410><s%> raiders <S%H1416><s%> shall raid <S%H1464><s%> him, But he shall raid <S%H1464><s%> [at] their heels. <S%H6119><s%>
"As for Asher, <S%H836><s%> his food <S%H3899><s%> shall be rich, <S%H8082><s%> And he shall yield <S%H5414><s%> royal <S%H4428><s%> dainties. <S%H4574><s%>
"Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> is a doe <S%H355><s%> let <S%H7971><s%> loose, <S%H7971><s%> He gives <S%H5414><s%> beautiful <S%H8233><s%> words. <S%H561><s%>

"Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough, <S%H1121><s%> A fruitful <S%H6509><s%> bough <S%H1121><s%> by a spring; <S%H5869><s%> [Its] branches <S%H1323><s%> run <S%H6805><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> a wall. <S%H7791><s%>
"The archers <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2671><s%> bitterly <S%H4843><s%> attacked him, And shot <S%H7232><s%> [at him] and harassed <S%H7852><s%> him;

But his bow <S%H7198><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> firm, <S%H386><s%> And his arms <S%H2220><s%> were agile, <S%H6339><s%> From the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> (From there <S%H8033><s%> is the Shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> the Stone <S%H68><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>),

From the God <S%H410><s%> of your father who helps <S%H1><s%> you, And by the Almighty <S%H5826><s%> who blesses <S%H7706><s%> you [With] blessings <S%H1288><s%> of heaven <S%H1293><s%> above, <S%H8064><s%> <S%H4480><s%> Blessings <S%H5921><s%> of the deep <S%H1293><s%> that lies <S%H8415><s%> beneath, <S%H7257><s%> Blessings <S%H8478><s%> of the breasts <S%H1293><s%> and of the womb. <S%H7699><s%>

"The blessings <S%H1293><s%> of your father Have surpassed <S%H1><s%> the blessings <S%H1396><s%> of my ancestors <S%H1293><s%> Up to the utmost <S%H2029><s%> bound <S%H8379><s%> of the everlasting <S%H8379><s%> hills; <S%H5769><s%> May they be on the head <S%H1389><s%> of Joseph, <S%H7218><s%> And on the crown <S%H3130><s%> of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the one <S%H6936><s%> distinguished <S%H5139><s%> among his brothers. <S%H5139><s%>

"Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> is a ravenous <S%H2963><s%> wolf; <S%H2061><s%> In the morning <S%H1242><s%> he devours <S%H398><s%> the prey, <S%H5706><s%> And in the evening <S%H6153><s%> he divides <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>"

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is what <S%H834><s%> their father said <S%H1><s%> to them when he blessed <S%H1696><s%> them. He blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, every <S%H1288><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with the blessing <S%H376><s%> appropriate to him.

Then he charged <S%H6680><s%> them and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I am about to be gathered <S%H622><s%> to my people; <S%H9415><s%> bury <S%H6912><s%> me with my fathers in the cave <S%H1><s%> that is in the field <S%H4631><s%> of Ephron <S%H7704><s%> the Hittite, <S%H6085><s%>

in the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah, <S%H4375><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> along with the field <S%H7704><s%> from Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%> for a burial <S%H6913><s%> site. <S%H272><s%>

"There <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> I buried <S%H6912><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> –
the field <S%H7704><s%> and the cave <S%H4631><s%> that is in it, purchased <S%H4735><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth. <S%H2845><s%> "

When Jacob <S%H3290><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> charging <S%H6680><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> he drew <S%H622><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> into the bed <S%H4296><s%> and breathed <S%H1478><s%> his last, <S%H1478><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people. <S%H9415><s%>
